title: Three deaths due to drowning
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Three persons have died after drowning in Dehiowita and Madampe areas.
Two residents Rajagiriya and Colombo 12 areas have died after drowning at the Seethawaka River in Dehiowita, near Yogama Bridge, Police stated.
Police further stated that a 44-year-old resident of Pallekele has drowned in the Thinipitiya Lake in Madampe as well.
